mean_cn: adj. 比较的，相对而言的；  n. 比较级
mean_en: connected with studying things to find out how similar or different they are
sentence: I did a comparative study of which kind of car uses the least fuel, and decided on the smallest car.
sentence_trans: 我对哪种车花费更少的油做了比较研究，然后选择了最小的那辆。
word_etyma: com共同 + par看见 + ative...的 → 看见共同之处的 → comparative比较的
